title: PM Modi recalls profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ on Good Friday | Politics
text: PM Modi recalls profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ on Good Friday Prime Minister Modi paid tribute to Jesus Christ's sacrifice on Good Friday, highlighting the importance of compassion and forgiveness in his message. Christians worldwide mark the occasion to remember Christ's crucifixion. Modi urged everyone to find strength in the lessons taught by Christ's sacrifice on this solemn day. [PTI](/pti-stories)| New Delhi | Updated: 29-03-2024 09:19 IST | Created: 29-03-2024 09:19 IST - Country: - India Prime Minister Narendra Modi remembered the ''profound sacrifice'' of Jesus Christ on Good Friday, saying it teaches people compassion and forgiveness. He said on X, ''Today, on Good Friday, we remember the profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ. May everyone find strength in the lessons of compassion and forgiveness it teaches us.'' Christians across the world observe Good Friday to commemorate the crucifixion of Christ.
